directions: In a large bowl take your ripe bananas, eggs and oil and mash.
In another bowl, combine the flour, sugar, pudding, baking soda and salt.
Mix dry mix and add to wet mix.
Fold in the chocolate and shredded coconut.
Flour pan and bake for 50-65 minutes
all recipes.author: Chrissy Teigen
all recipes.name: Banana Bread

directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a medium bowl, beat together butter and 2/3 cup sugar until combined.
Add in flour and blend well, then blend in the vanilla.
Using a cookie scoop, roll the dough into 1-inch balls.
Transfer to the baking sheets 2 inches apart and flatten.
Let rest on the baking sheets for at least 10-15 minutes
